summary: A collection of unit tests that exercise the AWS Inspector2 integration layer, covering admin account handling, service enablement, findings processing, member management, organization configuration, and tag operations, all using mocked AWS services for isolation.
business_intent: Ensure that the Inspector2 management code behaves correctly across various scenarios—such as account deletions, enabling the service, retrieving findings, managing members, configuring organization settings, and applying tags—so that the production implementation is reliable and conforms to expected AWS behavior.
